text:
Name of company: <http://Zeda.io|Zeda.io>

2. Name of role: Head of Marketing

3. Years of experience: 8-12

3. Current team composition: 1 Social Media Marketer, 1 Engagement/Community Marketer, 1 Content Writer, 1 Senior Product Marketer, 2 Freelance writers, 1 Marketing Demand Gen Agency

4. Location: Bengaluru

5. Answers to the following 3 questions:
5.1 _What do you envision the role will do in the first year?_
• Help set up the marketing engine and process.
• Help build the strategy to build a global SaaS brand.
• Mentor and build a strong inter team and intra team relationships.
_5.2 What will the role be measured on?_
• Organic Growth and Brand awareness in various markets
• Lead Generation through various activities
• Team feedback
_5.3 What's the annual marketing budget range?_
• This is something we would like the person who comes in to help set up. 
• We rely more on organic than paid, but open to discussion
6. Compensation Range: 35-45LPA + Generous ESOPs

text:
Hi Everyone,
*PLEASE hear me out* :slightly_smiling_face: 

Sharing the profile of a school-time classmate - Kreshi,  *to share any suitable entry-level job with her*

1. She's a bread earner for her family and makes 0 fuss about it. 
2. *Despite earning less than half of what I earn, her drive, and work ethic inspire me more than Forrest Gump.* 
3. She's just someone who's from a less fortunate background and hence not able to get the grounds to fight fair for her career until late.
4. I can vouch for her patience and crazy work ethic.
5. This woman's an asset even in toxic work environments, the best.
6. 4 months into her new job, she's already about to get promoted over and before her peers!
*I'm just trying to help her get a fair shot in a good culture once and watch her become a company asset.*

_*She's a Research Analyst in the Brand Protection domain, has experience in client and 3rd party dealings, and has also worked with Wipro in technical client mgmt._

Thank you for reading such a long message, let's try to help her as a community :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Hi Everyone,
PLEASE hear me out
Sharing the profile of a school-time classmate - Kreshi,
to share any suitable entry-level job with her
She's a bread earner for her family and makes 0 fuss about it.
Despite earning less than half of what I earn, her drive, and work ethic inspire me more than Forrest Gump.
She's just someone who's from a less fortunate background and hence not able to get the grounds to fight fair for her career until late.
I can vouch for her patience and crazy work ethic.
This woman's an asset even in toxic work environments, the best.
4 months into her new job, she's already about to get promoted over and before her peers!
I'm just trying to help her get a fair shot in a good culture once and watch her become a company asset.
*She's a Research Analyst in the Brand Protection domain, has experience in client and 3rd party dealings, and has also worked with Wipro in technical client mgmt.
Thank you for reading such a long message, let's try to help her as a community

text:
Hey everyone. I have a tough time sometimes as I go through bouts of self doubt (or Impostor syndrome) and a heightened sense of self importance (sometimes I feel my opinions matter more than they really do in systems/cultures and I feel frustrated when my ideas are not acted upon. I sometimes feel I have failed in convincing others).

Posting in this channel as I think it has/will impact my career choices as I work anywhere/look out for new opportunities, couldn’t find a more relevant channel for now (please redirect if needed). I have started sharing this with my therapist now and it is helping but any experiences here from people who have faced it/facing it will help me to learn and grow.

The <#C02S4318139|jobopps> channel has been a lawless land for long. All of us, including me have posted jobs in any format under the sun.

It's changing right now.

Here's the format that needs to be followed for all job postings in the community:

1. Name of company:

2. Name of role:

3. Years of experience:

3. Current team composition:

4. Location:

5. Answers to the following 3 questions:
5.1 _What do you envision the role will do in the first year?_
_5.2 What will the role be measured on?_
_5.3 What's the annual marketing budget range?_

6. Compensation Range:

We are going to be strict about it. s11s is a curated place and we need to ensure quality in every last bit of this wonderful place.

Let people put some efforts to hire the awesome folks here.

text:
Hiring for Sales and Marketing superstars at <https://dataweave.com/in/home>

DataWeave is working with leading global Ecommerce and Brands and provides them with channel intelligence for their rapid growth..!

We are on a roll and on track to be a Unicorn in the coming few years.

A great product needs brilliant Sales and Marketing team to scale.

Can promise a ride of exponential growth, learning, fun and success for the right candidates.

<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dm&highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6922425044023275520|DM> me / Email me at <mailto:abhinav.gupta@dataweave.com|abhinav.gupta@dataweave.com> if you find it interesting.

✓ *Sales Leader (10+ years of Experience) - UK & Europe Market* - Experience in Enterprise B2B SaaS product Sales with an understanding of eCommerce and CPG domain. Preferably Based in the UK.

✓ *Inside Sales Leader (8+ years of Experience)* - Lead the team of Inside Sales Reps and guide them in generating leads, doing initial conversations and Demos. Plan market focus and sales collaterals with Marketing.

✓ *Inside Sales Reps (4+ years of Experience)* - Generate leads, leading initial conversations and Demos. Analyse geography, market and accounts comprehensively for strategic reach outs.

✓ *Lead for Email Marketing / Campaign Manager* (4+ years of Experience) - Generate leads using Email campaigns and Social Media.

text:
D91 Labs is looking for highly qualified and self-driven individuals to support and conduct  research projects. D91 Labs strives to conduct research at the intersection of fintech, financial inclusion and understanding the last-mile customer.

As a Senior Research Fellow, you will conduct in-house and collaborative projects with partner organisations and share research findings with the fintech community through public channels and forums. D91 Labs focuses on understanding a wide range of financial products and their last-mile delivery mechanism to the people through technology. The Senior Research Fellow will play a pivotal role in the evangelization of building research-driven fintech products for India. This role is a one of its kind opportunity to build in public and make an impact in the fintech space.

<https://setu.zohorecruit.in/jobs/Careers/15063000006839001/Senior-Research-Fellow-%E2%80%94-D91-Labs?source=CareerSite>

text:
Jobs at Goldcast. Highly recommended place to work

<https://jobs.lever.co/goldcast/719011dd-d727-455e-8e1e-6aabc7f99d3c>

<https://jobs.lever.co/goldcast/ed89b517-e951-47ae-841d-9704f8f79a53>

Know the founders personally. Please refer anyone you know

attachments.text: What You'll Do As one of the early product managers in the company, you will play a key role in owning product execution and helping existing products mature and gain more adoption. You’ll own a big part of the product strategy and roadmap for the following parts of the product: Registration Product: We are building a full featured registration site builder for event marketers to build. Our registration site builder will feature a drag and drop page builder, embedded forms, and ticketing functionalities and will interface seamlessly with our other event products. You will own Virtual Events Product: The virtual event product is our flagship product. Organizers use it to conduct everything from a webinar to a full scale virtual conference. You will be the product owner for the virtual event product and own all the metrics that define the product's success- NPS, adoption, and value leadership vs competitors.
attachments.title: Goldcast - Product Manager

attachments.text: As a Product Designer, you will collaborate with product managers, engineers, and other designers. Together you will optimize product experiences that drive revenue and improve retention. You will own Goldcast’s user experience and visual design language. You’ll advocate for an exceptional user experience as part of a fully remote team that values experimentation, iteration, and a willingness to take risks. The ideal candidate for this position will be able to visualize an experience in the abstract, break down complex use cases and then be able to drive the vision into solid design deliverables. You think first from the customer’s perspective, use research and data to influence your designs, set relentlessly high standards for yourself and deliver best-in-class customer experiences.
attachments.title: Goldcast - Lead UX Designer

Hi everyone, my sister-in-law, who is a doctor by profession (MBBS, DNB (Family Medicine)) got hooked to Data Analysis and has completed online Data Science and Business Analytics from University of Texas, McCombs school of business. She is looking for remote data analytics intern opportunities. Her pivot from being a full time doctor running her own clinic to studying data science part-time shows her deep interest and passion in this field. If your company or you know anyone who is looking to hire Data Science interns, please connect with me. Thanks in advance. 
(Her LinkedIn profile - <https://www.linkedin.com/in/geeta-gangavati-huilgol-33616442|https://www.linkedin.com/in/geeta-gangavati-huilgol-33616442>)

text:
Hi folks! <http://novabenefits.com|Nova Benefits> is hiring for -

1. Demand Generation - SEO
2. Product Marketing Manager
3. Demand Generation Specialist - Growth
4. Growth and Content Interns 
More details here - <https://nova-benefits.skillate.com/jobs?page=0&pageSize=10&department=Growth&location=&title=&sortBy=&orderBy=ASC>

Do get in touch if interested!

attachments.text: NovaBenefits is on a mission to provide the best in class health and wellness benefits for employees in India. We envision that a vast majority of the county's population will get better access to high-quality healthcare through their employers.We are a tech-first company and believe that technology can make this vision a reality by offering a 10x better experience and fixing the broken processes for all stakeholders - Employees, Employers, HR admins, Insurers, and Healthcare <http://providers.At|providers.At> Nova, we're looking to create and own the employee wellness category. In a short span of 15 months, we've built an outstanding team, achieved product-market fit, raised double-digit millions in funding and become the first company to secure an IRDAI Insurance broking license. The difference? We see ourselves in the business of improving employee happiness instead of insurance and as such more an HR tech company.Nova Benefits has been co-founded by&nbsp;Yash Gupta&nbsp;(IIT Delhi - Comp Sci, Samsung Korea) and&nbsp;Saransh Garg&nbsp;(IIT Bombay, BCG, Accel, Y-Combinator). We are backed by the top venture funds in the country - BVP, SIG, Better Capital, Titan Capital and Multiply Ventures.Want to know more about the work culture and diversity in Nova Benefits? Checkout Nova Benefits in Glassdoor.

text:
Folks, there's a job opportunity at Esper. Please share this with someone who's looking for a change.
*Job Designation:- Social Media Campaign Manager*
*Location:- Bangalore*
*Company Web-link:- <https://www.esper.io/>Linkedin Profile:-<https://www.linkedin.com/company/esperdev/about/>*

*Key Responsibilities*
• Ideate, create, and manage paid social media marketing campaigns for Esper, establishing and building brand visibility, engagement, and performance.
• End-to-end execution of a full-funnel marketing campaign across geographies and social media channels.
• Completely own campaign planning, structure, budget, and reporting.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams in visual design, marketing, revenue operations, and sales to maximize reach.
• Extend optimization and strategic efforts beyond the click-through rate, utilizing our suite of customized conversion tracking and analytics tools to focus on ROI, setting and beating benchmark returns month over month. Run A/B test experiments on landing pages, ad copies & content.
• Measure and analyze performance, provide regular insights and reports, offer recommendations and identify growth opportunities on an ongoing basis.
• Evaluate and experiment with campaigns on new social platforms.
*Core skills and experience*
• 4+ years of experience in running social media campaigns.
• Deep understanding of Linkedin ad platform.
• Exposure to B2B marketing across geographies.
• Good analytical & creative skills.
• Experimental and results-driven mindset.
• Experience managing a brand’s social channels, including strategy, conceptualization, scheduling, and execution.
• Strong written and verbal communication skills.
• Ability to perform in a fast-paced startup environment.•
• Attention to detail, excellent organization skills, and ability to manage multiple projects and responsibilities both internally and externally.
Priyansh Mishra - *9289548924/9310650633/8285467491*
<mailto:priyansh@huntingcube.com|priyansh@huntingcube.com>
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/priyansh-mishra-150146173>

attachments.fallback: DevOps Platform for Mission Critical Android Devices | Esper
attachments.text: Esper is the first platform built for Android enterprise device management and DevOps, so you can deploy devices, manage apps, and secure your fleet.

text:
Brand Marketing/ Account Management

Hey folks! A very close friend is looking for her next role. She has spent all of her career (5+ years) into client servicing at enterprise real estate firms (JLL, Cushman) and some time in agencies working with brands like Meesho, Times internet, etc.

Her preference is to get into Brand marketing and comms roles in SaaS but anybody who has been in SaaS would know how difficult that is for people with non-SaaS background. Nevertheless, B2B or B2C, any help would be really really appreciated. Just that location has to be either NCR or Bangalore.

Thanks for reading through and I can share more info/ CV in DM.

text:
*PRODUCT MARKETING JOBS*

A friend of mine is seeking a change desperately. He is an awesome resource and an asset to any team. While  he has done lot of marketing, he excels at product marketing. He's currently at a good mid-sized SaaS (~40mn revenue) but is sick of lack of clarity/leadership et al. In fact, ever since joining, there have been two CMO exits, VP of PMM exit and no leadership in mktg for over 8 months now. He feels he's time is getting wasted.

He's a mid-senior PMM with approx 7-8yrs experience and he's in the CTC 20-25 LPA range. Would you know of any opportunities with you or elsewhere either in Pune or remote first ( he can travel as many times as needed but can't relocate).

If needed, I can share more in a DM.

elements.text: Hi everyone,

text:
Hello Everyone,

We are looking to hire for multiple roles at Emitrr (<http://emitrr.com|emitrr.com>)

1. Product marketing
2. Performance marketing
3. Marketing campaign manager
Take a look at all the open positions here: <https://www.notion.so/emitrr/Join-The-Team-ec2bcc26db1743b080bed1fd8fc2e9c3>

Few things about Emitrr:

1. We are building the Hubspot for offline businesses (Doctors, Home service providers) by integrating with vertical CRMs like Zenoti, Mindbody, ServiceTitan. 
2. We are backed by Tier 1 VCs in India and in the US and are growing 100% QoQ.
3. Completely remote opportunity with flexibility to define your own work schedule.
4. Our goal is to get to $2M ARR by December this year. You’ll play a massive role in us getting there.
Feel free to write to <mailto:harshal.gupta@emitrr.com|harshal.gupta@emitrr.com> if any of these positions are of interest to you.

Our website is so bad, it should give you an idea why we are hiring a product marketer :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.fallback: Emitrr on Notion: Join The Team
attachments.text: Hey! We are changing the way local businesses in the US communicate and engage with their customers with this exciting product. We believe our online shopping sites are so technologically advanced to give a good customer experience so why should these businesses be deprived of technology when the customers who use an online shopping site and a local business are the same.
attachments.title: Join The Team

text:
Hello Everyone,

We are looking to hire for <https://www.tripledart.com|TripleDart> ( we have 2 open roles)

1. Digital campaign manager (at least 1.5 years of PPC experience)
2. Senior paid media specialist ( at least 3 years exp, SaaS background)
If anyone interested pls dm me or share the below details with <mailto:team@tripledart.com|team@tripledart.com>. :point_down:

1. LinkedIn profile
2. Current salary
3. Notice period
4. Why TripleDart ( in 1 liner)
JD, for your reference
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tnTegKfXdGW55EQKfSMbVRbbIJK1_8UOEt32tkSuy4w/edit#|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tnTegKfXdGW55EQKfSMbVRbbIJK1_8UOEt32tkSuy4w/edit#>.

Interview process:
• Shortlisted candidates will go through a screening call
• Small assessment ( Async)
• Assessment debriefing & tech round
• Culture interview

attachments.fallback: TripleDart - Performance Marketing agency for SaaS Companies
attachments.text: We plan, execute, and manage integrated digital marketing campaigns across organic, paid, and social channels that grow your marketing and sales pipeline.
